attributes.action: Make Saint George's Day a Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Scots have a holiday for Saint Andrew.
The Welsh Saint David and the Irish Saint Patrick,so the English should celebrate Saint George's Day a bank holiday to fall on the Monday closer to the 23rd April(ST GEORGES DAY)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
